alert.note: Alert for City of Norfolk (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 17 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM EDT FOR ...THE CITY OF NORFOLK AND THE NORTHERN CITY OF VIRGINIA BEACH... At 830 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Norfolk, or over Ocean View, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Virginia Wesleyan University, Regent University and Norfolk International around 835 PM EDT. Kempsville around 840 PM EDT. Virginia Beach around 850 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bayside, Oceana, Rudee Heights, Wards Corner, Princess Anne Plaza, North Virginia Beach, Dam Neck, Oceana NAS, Gallups Corner and Willoughby Spit. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
